general: Today, Aquarius feels a wave of creative energy as Mercury forms a trine with Uranus. It is the perfect time to explore new ideas and venture off the beaten path. Social interactions will be enriching, and you may make surprising discoveries about yourself.
love: Do not hesitate to share your deepest thoughts with your partner; it will strengthen your connection.
work: Leverage your originality at work; your innovative ideas could be the boost your team needs.
health: Incorporate a new physical activity that excites you; movement is your ally today.
advice: Dare to step out of your comfort zone.
